name: albatross pendant
description: A magic communication device that delivers headlines from the Albatross Press.

name: archive
description: A talking crystal ball that is programmed to recall information stored inside.

name: atlas incognito
description: A book of 10 magic stamps that reveals interesting local information.

name: blink blade
description: A magic sword that can teleport back to its user's hand. <2>

name: brell's boat in a box
description: A small wooden box that can expand into a real, working sloop.

name: brell's charismatic couture
description: A line of magical shapeshifting garments that automatically find a perfect fit for their wearer.

name: brell's limitless ledger
description: A magical networked codex that duplicates entries from linked journals.

name: brell's tent in a tin
description: A magic tin canister that can deploy a large tent.

name: dim grimoire
description: A magic notebook that's risky to read, but can provide great benefits.

name: discretion
description: A magic scabbard that can make weapons appear invisible.

name: field monitor
description: A magic map that can respond to questions and provide useful information.

name: friend flute
description: A magic whistle that knows who your friends are.

name: glitter bomb
description: A pouch of magic glitter that dispels invisibility.

name: goat simulator
description: A magic stuff toy goat that can turn into a lifesized illusory goat.

name: healing potion
description: A potion that heals you. What were you expecting?

name: kiln gauze
description: A container of magic gauze that can be used to repair broken metal weapons.

name: light trap
description: A magic glass orb that can be used like a camera.

name: lying lyre
description: A magic lyre that guides its user's hands to produce a beautiful song.

name: magic potion
description: A vial filled with magic liquid that has unpredictable effects.

name: mischievous marbles
description: A bag of marbles that seeks out creatures to trip.

name: not a pipe
description: This is a pipe. When smoked, it creates a thick magical fog.

name: permanent solution
description: A small dropper filled with magic liquid that can permanently bond two things treasure catalog together.

name: portable potent potable probe
description: A small box with a magic dish that can be used to detect poison.

name: quiplasher
description: A sentient magic whip that loves witty one-liners. <3>

name: ramification
description: A magic battering ram that can shatter wooden doors.

name: registrar
description: A magic book that automatically senses and records the most commonly-used name of a creature that passes nearby.

name: repeater
description: A compact magic crossbow. <4>[2 ap]

name: silvery horn
description: An enchanted horn that can send messages far and wide. [2 ap]

name: skycaller amulets
description: Pairs of magic amulets that allow their owners to communicate with each other.

name: the catcher
description: A heavy metal gauntlet that allows the wearer to prevent weapon attacks. [1 ap]

name: the howdy doodat
description: A magic candle that detects illusions.

name: the lagniappe
description: A weapon with a little extra damage. <3>

name: the left-handed smoke shifter
description: A metal rod that sends the bearer on an impossible quest.

name: the sure shot
description: A magic bow that guides its user's hand. <2>

name: tricky ticket
description: Magic tickets that can transform into forgeries.

name: untamed magic broom
description: A flying broom with its own agenda.

name: the true witness
description: A set of linked magic glasses that share perspectives.

name: wraithfire bomb
description: A dark crystal orb that goes boom. <4>

name: abdellahi's scepter
description: A magic scepter that casts a chilling spell. <2>

name: abyssal brand
description: An edged weapon forged by a conniving demon. <2>

name: accursed band
description: A translucent magic bracelet that can detect spirits.

name: big belt of strong strength
description: An unusually large belt that makes you feel unusually strong. [1 ap]

name: bonebreaker
description: A giant hammer imbued with magic force that accelerates the weapon as it is swung. <2>

name: chaos pearls
description: A bag of luminescent magic pearls that can explode with force.

name: dawnbringer
description: A greathammer imbued with radiant light. <2>[2 ap]

name: death adder
description: A small magic tally counter that senses nearby deaths. [1 ap]

name: defiance
description: A silvered short blade that grants the wielder immunity against mind magic. <2>

name: draconis
description: A longsword forged in the flame of a dragon's breath. <2>

name: dress of many pockets
description: A magic dress that deceptively appears to have no pockets. It has many.

name: gideon's shroud
description: A cloak that makes the wearer undetectable by magic.

name: lichblade
description: The weapon of a banished lich that casts a malevolent aura. <2>

name: masterwork
description: A weapon of incredible quality that still bears its maker's mark. <3>

name: needful gift box
description: A small wooden box that can produce an object of value.

name: perspicacious pot
description: A magic pot that can create a recipe.

name: portal chalk
description: A stick of chalk that can open a portal.

name: professor prim's mind exploder
description: A magic consumable that bestows a new ability.

name: scintillating wand
description: A magic wand that fills the wielder with mischievous thoughts.

name: scrying sphere
description: A magic crystal ball that gives the user a glimpse at the future.

name: scion
description: A magic pincushion that can detect family relations.

name: serpentine staff
description: A snakewood staff that can transform into a viper. <2>[1 ap]

name: spell scroll
description: A magic scroll enchanted with a spell.

name: spirit trap
description: A crystal orb that attracts and traps spirit creatures nearby.

name: the bouncer
description: A magic buckler that turns the table on attackers.

name: the compensator
description: A broadsword with an envy problem. <2>

name: the eager edge
description: A sentient magic sword that loves to be used. <2>

name: the miracle sponge
description: A sponge with almost no limit to its thirst.

name: a magician's key
description: An obsidian skeleton key that creates a private plane. [5 ap]

name: ancient ranger's pouch
description: A pouch filled with seeds that grow into sentient tree creatures.

name: bane
description: A magical dagger that tries to charm nearby creatures. <2>

name: blood pact
description: A sentient blade that curses whoever picks it up to feel an unquenchable bloodthirst. <4>

name: cloak of a hundred billion stars
description: A magic cloak that allows an Invoker to commune with the stars.

name: conway's comrades
description: A set of magic toy figurines that can come alive to do battle. [4 ap]

name: cosmic purse
description: A magic bag that can hold an unlimited number of items.

name: creighton's fascinators
description: A pair of tall black boots that cast an aura of leadership. [5 ap]

name: echo
description: A ring that duplicates spells and reflects them.

name: fable
description: A weapon handed down through generations that records the deeds of its wielder. <3>

name: guile
description: A cameo brooch that can create an illusory visage. [1 ap]

name: gungrox's coin
description: A smooth platinum coin that randomize a player's role.

name: harmony
description: A weathered wooden lute that seeks music through the omniverse. [5 ap]

name: harper's haven
description: A small stone figurine with world-shaking power. [10 ap]

name: june's blanket
description: A patchwork blanket that offers love and comfort. [1/4 ap]

name: lorelai's wand
description: A magic wand that imbues the wielder with incredible power.

name: loren's luminous starglass
description: A magic telescope that carries its wielder through the stars. [3/9 ap]

name: multivious map
description: A sentient map of the stars that loves to pontificate about possibility. [1 ap]

name: nightmare
description: A greatsword that gives walking nightmares. <3>

name: prismatic circlet
description: This crystal crown that projects a major illusion. [3 ap]

name: resplendent plate
description: An indomitable breastplate that makes the wearer resistant to attacks.

name: rebellion
description: An ancient bronze shield that lights the fires of independence. [4 ap]

name: shadow
description: A magic shortblade forged by a malevolent god that reaps souls. <3>

name: the cosmic cruiser
description: A magic starship that can travel through space and the omniverse. [3/9 ap]

name: the toll
description: An iridescent coin that offers eternal paradise.

name: unity
description: A magic pin allowing the wearer to comprehend languages.

name: vol
description: A magic spear that can become a bolt of lightning. <3>

name: conservator's ring
description: An unimaginably powerful ring that can consume universes. [9 ap]

name: cosmic forge
description: An obsidian ring that allows the bearer to conjure any object into existence.

name: dubbin's dire die
description: A 20-sided die that bends the fate of nearby creatures. [4 ap]

name: it whispers to you
description: A humble ring that bestows a terrible and cursed power.

name: the hand
description: A pocketwatch that can travel through time. [3/9 ap]

name: wish heart
description: A magic locket that turns wishes into reality.
